part_description: Three horizontal drawers with handles, stacked vertically in a rectangular frame.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out smoothly within the frame, supported by internal tracks. The handles are securely attached to the front of each drawer, allowing for easy pulling and pushing. The drawers occupy the majority of the cabinet’s internal space, maximizing storage capacity.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against walls or in corners, serving as a storage unit. Users can pull out drawers to access stored items. The flat top surface can hold decorative items or additional storage containers.
